lines.text: This is blasphemous literature! I'd rather Jessica be illiterate than to have her reading about defiant, perverse, Godless souls!
Goddamn me to hell, I slept with my brother's wife! And not just once, but time and time again!

Feeling regretful, Frank? Well, I guess that's pretty standard in your line of work. I'll never apologize for the way I am. I like it. If I want someone's blood I'll take it. And I'm not ashamed of what I am and what I want and how I want it, and I want you. My soul, my flesh craves you.
My client is certainly entitled for compensation for pain and suffering.
Pain and suffering? The woman is dead.
She's not crazy, she's a vampire!
Let her go, you big, dumb, ugly FUCK!
